rows.label: qst100305_msg0101
rows.name:
Did you gather the materials
for the repairs, mo?

rows.label: qst100305_msg0102
rows.name: Thank you, mo! I'm so grateful, mo!

rows.label: qst100305_msg0103
rows.name:
I forgot my wallet, so I'll
pay you properly when I get
back to Avaritia, mo.

rows.label: qst100305_msg0202
rows.name:
A little twist... and
ho-ho-hoi-hoi, mo!

rows.label: qst100305_msg0301
rows.name: Done, mo! Looks like it's fixed, mo!

rows.label: qst100305_msg0302
rows.name:
You've been a great help
to me, mo. Words of gratitude
are not enough, mo.

rows.label: qst100305_msg0303
rows.name:
I'll give you a heartfelt reward and
the cost of the materials you gathered
when I get to Avaritia, mo.

rows.label: qst100305_msg0401
rows.name:
Mo?! My training time is
almost at 40 hours, mo!

rows.label: qst100305_msg0402
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'm flying all the way to
Avaritia, mo! Hahahaha!!
